title: THE HINDU SAYS COALITION PARTNER DMK’S DECISION TO PULL OUT OF LANKA TRIP IS A MAJOR EMBARRASSMENT
content: Onlanka News – By Walter Jayawardhana The decision of the Drvida Munnetra Kazhagam Party(DMK), a constituent of the United  Progressive Alliance (UPA) government in New Delhi to keep out of a Parliamentary delegation going to Sri Lanka could be called a major embarrassment to Manmohan Singh led government  said the Hindu newspaper….
